channel.title: True Blue on BYUtv
channel.description: This weekly magazine show features BYU fan-favorite athletes and coaches. Reporters bring viewers to the action and introduce them to the personalities that make BYU Sports remarkable.

item.title: Week of 2/9/2011
item.description: TRUE BLUE -This episode gives you the latest on the men's basketball team with Robbie Bullough previewing their final conference battle with arch rival Utah.
item.media:title: Week of 2/9/2011
item.media:description: TRUE BLUE -This episode gives you the latest on the men's basketball team with Robbie Bullough previewing their final conference battle with arch rival Utah.

item.title: Week of 1/26/2011
item.description: TRUE BLUE - This week, True Blue scouts out what many have billed as the biggest basketball game in Marriott Center history as the #9 BYU men's team prepares to host #4 SDSU. True Blue and the women's gymnastics team pay tribute to BYU's late athletic trainer, Gay Merrill. Then, get to know men's volleyball freshman phenom, Taylor Sander.
item.media:title: Week of 1/26/2011
item.media:description: TRUE BLUE - This week, True Blue scouts out what many have billed as the biggest basketball game in Marriott Center history as the #9 BYU men's team prepares to host #4 SDSU. True Blue and the women's gymnastics team pay tribute to BYU's late athletic trainer, Gay Merrill. Then, get to know men's volleyball freshman phenom, Taylor Sander.

item.title: Week of 1/19/2011
item.description: TRUE BLUE - One high school has turned out more BYU basketball players than any other, and this week True Blue takes you there to meet the growing Cougars. Then meet one of the men behind the Cougars' dream season: Coach Dave Rice. Finally, True Blue serves up the hottest ticket on campus as men's volleyball returns to the Smith Fieldhouse.
item.media:title: Week of 1/19/2011
item.media:description: TRUE BLUE - One high school has turned out more BYU basketball players than any other, and this week True Blue takes you there to meet the growing Cougars. Then meet one of the men behind the Cougars' dream season: Coach Dave Rice. Finally, True Blue serves up the hottest ticket on campus as men's volleyball returns to the Smith Fieldhouse.

item.title: Week of 1/12/2011
item.description: TRUE BLUE - The Cougars kick off independence this fall with a brand-new offensive coordinator. Meet Brandon Doman and find out what direction he plans an taking the offense this next season. Then, sit down with Coach Judkins as his Lady Cougars get ready to take on the Utes--10 years after Judkins left the University of Utah for rival BYU. Finally, meet BYU freshman Kate Hansen, who is taking a lunge and making the luge team for the United States.
item.media:title: Week of 1/12/2011
item.media:description: TRUE BLUE - The Cougars kick off independence this fall with a brand-new offensive coordinator. Meet Brandon Doman and find out what direction he plans an taking the offense this next season. Then, sit down with Coach Judkins as his Lady Cougars get ready to take on the Utes--10 years after Judkins left the University of Utah for rival BYU. Finally, meet BYU freshman Kate Hansen, who is taking a lunge and making the luge team for the United States.

item.title: Week of 1/5/2011
item.description: TRUE BLUE - This episode previews the BYU's men's basketball team's first conference game of the season, a matchup with nationally ranked UNLV in Las Vegas, as they take one last tour through the Mountain West Conference. True Blue then profiles men's basketball player, James Anderson and women's basketball point guard, Jasmine Foreman. Finally, get a tour of BYU Broadcasting's brand new building and a look at the role it will play in producing more BYU sports broadcasts.

item.media:description: TRUE BLUE - This episode previews the BYU's men's basketball team's first conference game of the season, a matchup with nationally ranked UNLV in Las Vegas, as they take one last tour through the Mountain West Conference. True Blue then profiles men's basketball player, James Anderson and women's basketball point guard, Jasmine Foreman. Finally, get a tour of BYU Broadcasting's brand new building and a look at the role it will play in producing more BYU sports broadcasts.

item.title: Week of 12/22/2010
item.description: TRUE BLUE - This week's special episode highlights BYU's victory over UTEP in the New Mexico Bowl and offers an early outlook on next year's potential for success.
item.media:title: Week of 12/22/2010
item.media:description: TRUE BLUE - This week's special episode highlights BYU's victory over UTEP in the New Mexico Bowl and offers an early outlook on next year's potential for success.

item.title: Week of 12/29/2010
item.description: TRUE BLUE - This week's episode takes a look a back at some of the lives that were touched by the football team and their participation in the Thursday Heroes program this past season.
item.media:title: Week of 12/29/2010
item.media:description: TRUE BLUE - This week's episode takes a look a back at some of the lives that were touched by the football team and their participation in the Thursday Heroes program this past season.

item.title: Week of 12/8/2010
item.description: TRUE BLUE - This 1-hour special edition includes an announcement from BYU athletic director Tom Holmoe about the 2011 football schedule. Then get an exciting preview of the upcoming New Mexico Bowl on December 18.

item.title: TRUE BLUE SPECIAL EDITION - Utah Press Conference
item.description: Live press conference with Head Coach Bronco Mendenhall of the BYU Cougars, discussing their matchup with the Utah Utes.
item.media:title: TRUE BLUE SPECIAL EDITION - Utah Press Conference
item.media:description: Live press conference with Head Coach Bronco Mendenhall of the BYU Cougars, discussing their matchup with the Utah Utes.

item.title: Week of 11/17/2010
item.description: TRUE BLUE - The Cougars fought valiantly against Colorado State; relive highlights from the exciting game. Look forward to the basketball game against Utah State and meet some special tuba players in the Cougar Marching Band. Then, join the football team in welcoming a Thursday's Hero to practice.

item.title: TRUE BLUE SPECIAL EDITION - New Mexico Press Conference
item.description: Live press conference with Head Coach Bronco Mendenhall of the BYU Cougars, discussing their matchup with the New Mexico Lobos.
